page.title: 14ANTIQUE SHOPS IN BROADWAY
page.content: {Broadway}has many fine antique shops and picture galleries. Some of these specialist shops are branches of well known London firms. It is possible to buy original 17th and 18th century pieces of furniture and have them packaged and documented for export. Shopping for antiques in{Broadway}is popular with Americans! Some shops specialise in old china, especially Worcester porcelain, and others sell exquisite jewellery and silverware. The local auctioneers hold regular furniture sales in the Lifford Hall. Some antique furniture sold at these sales is restored locally and then exported to America. A wide variety of antique prints, maps and old books are available in one shop and elsewhere a selection of old paintings, both in oils and water colours, is offered for sale.
